item.title: Roadmap to native API (i.e. camera)
item.description: I am unable to install phonegap due to the installer being borked (seems issue occurs for others as well for the last few weeks and is not being...
item.content:
I am unable to install phonegap due to the installer being borked (seems issue occurs for others as well for the last few weeks and is not being addressed) and I need to access the camera/camera roll on ios. I am curious as to when we can expect this functionality in the new native packaging?

Thanks!

item.title: Access a Toolbar->ComboBox from a controller?
item.description:
Hi Guys
I have a view that inherits from Toolbar, this toolbar contains several controls including buttons and combo boxes.. How do I access the...
item.content:
Hi Guys

I have a view that inherits from Toolbar, this toolbar contains several controls including buttons and combo boxes.. How do I access the individual controls objects from within the controller? How do I set an identifier for them? Basically I need direct access to the objects in order to setup some default values etc.

Before anybody say give each control an "ID" and use ComponentQuery - this will work ;) but my understanding is specifically setting an ID is bad practice (it basically means the view cannot be re-used, as it bitches about having the 2 items with the same ID).

Example code -

Code:
Ext.define('x.view.Toolbar', {
 extend: 'toolbar.Toolbar',
 alias: 'widget.syslog_toolbar', 
    height: 50,
    dock: 'top',
   
    items: [
            {
                xtype: 'combobox',
                width: 100,
                fieldLabel: 'Host',
                labelAlign: 'top',
                labelPad: 0,
                store: "syslog.Host",
                displayField: 'name',
                queryMode: 'local',
            },
           
            {
                xtype: 'datefield',
                width: 100,
                type: "date",
                fieldLabel: 'From',
                labelAlign: 'top',
                labelPad: 0,
                format: 'd/m/Y',
                submitFormat: 'd/m/Y',
                }
              ]
});
Any help or advise or the "correct" method would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
item.author: kelv1n

item.title: Why controler don't work?
item.description:
This is my controller code:
PHP: --------- Ext.define('MyApp.controller.Wrapper', { extend: 'Ext.app.Controller',
stores: [ ...
item.content:
This is my controller code:

PHP Code:
Ext.define('MyApp.controller.Wrapper', {
    extend: 'Ext.app.Controller',

    stores: [
        'RegionStore',
        'CityStore'
    ],
    
    views: [
        'Wrapper'
    ],
    
    init: function() {
        
       this.control({
            
            '#combo-region': {
                select: this.onRegionSelect
            },
            '#combo-city': {
                select: this.onCitySelect
            }

        });
        
    },
    
    onRegionSelect: function(combo) {
        //don't work
        Ext.widget('wrapper').down('#combo-city').clearValue();
        //work
        Ext.widget('wrapper').down('#combo-city').store.clearFilter();
        //work
        Ext.widget('wrapper').down('#combo-city').store.filter('cid', combo.getValue());
        //work
        alert('Ok');
    },
    
    onCitySelect: function() {
        //don't work
        Ext.widget('wrapper').down('#button-select-city').enable();
        //don't work
        Ext.Msg.alert('Ok', 'Работает');
    }
    
}); 
full code with controller, view, store, data files :

http://www.onlinedisk.ru/file/776740/

item.title: Ohio State Vs Michigan live stream
item.description: The Michigan State Spartans travel to Columbus, Ohio, on Saturday to take the Ohio State Buckeyes.Both the Spartans and Buckeyes are ranked outside...
item.content:
The Michigan State Spartans travel to Columbus, Ohio, on Saturday to take the Ohio State Buckeyes.Both the Spartans and Buckeyes are ranked outside the Top 25, but a win is likely to re-enter them.The Buckeyes are starting freshman quarterback Braxton Miller field and this will be his first real test of the season.As for the team, Ohio State has failed its only real challenge of this season, losing to Miami (FL). The Spartans have also failed in his only test this season, losing to Notre Dame.Therefore, Saturday's game will be a matchup of teams that desperately need a victory to prove they are real.Should be fun to watch.



Michigan Vs Ohio State live stream | Ohio State Vs Michigan live stream
item.author: Soie258

item.title: understanding rendering map the 2nd time
item.description:
Hello,
I just cannot seem to figure out why following code does not work 2nd time :
in controller :
Code: --------- showmap:...
item.content:
Hello,

I just cannot seem to figure out why following code does not work 2nd time :

in controller :
Code:
    showmap: function(options){
        this.mapPanel = this.render({
            xtype: 'LocationsMapView'
        });
        this.application.viewport.setActiveItem(this.mapPanel, {type:'fade'});
        this.myOptions = {
            zoom: 10,
            zoomControlOptions: {
                style: google.maps.ZoomControlStyle.LARGE
            },
            mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP
        }
        this.map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("mapPanelId"), this.myOptions);
        this.geo = new Ext.util.GeoLocation({
            autoUpdate: false,
            allowHighAccuracy:true
        });
        this.geo.on(
            'locationupdate',
            function(){
                this.centerLatLng = new google.maps.LatLng(this.geo.coords.latitude, this.geo.coords.longitude);
                this.map.setCenter(this.centerLatLng)
            },
            this);
        this.geo.updateLocation();
}
view panel :
Code:
MyApp.views.LocationsMapView = Ext.extend(Ext.Panel, {
      layout: 'fit',
      dockedItems: [{
            xtype:'toolbar',
            dock: 'top',
            items: [.....]
      }],
      items:[{
          xtype:'panel',
          id:'mapPanelId'
      }]
});
Ext.reg('LocationsMapView', AFCApp.views.LocationsMapView);
I've tried to wrap the view panel configurations in initComponent with same results.
So I'm trying to setActiveItem the panel with id, then use DOM to proceed with googlemap API, using coordinates from Ext.util.GeoLocation.

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
item.author: won.rhee

item.title: CheckBoxGroup.resetOriginalValue throws an exception in Ext.Base.callParent
item.description:
Form fields:
Code: --------- items:[ { xtype : 'checkboxgroup', fieldLabel : 'Enable', items: [
item.content:
Form fields:

Code:
items:[
    {
      xtype  : 'checkboxgroup',
      fieldLabel : 'Enable',
      items: [
        {
          boxLabel  : 'Yes',
          name      : 'enable_chat'
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      xtype: 'textfield',
      name: 'chat_link',
      fieldLabel: 'Chat Link'
    }
  ],
after the tab with the form is activated I call this.load(...) and listend to action complete:
Code:
actioncomplete: function(panel, action) {
      console.log('action completed', action);
      if (action.type === "load" || action.type === "submit") {
        this.getForm().getFields().each(function(f) {
          f.resetOriginalValue(); // <-- blows up right here
          f.setReadOnly(true);
        });
        this.topButtons.setReadOnly(true);
      }


    }
the exception is thrown here:

Code:
callParent: function(args) {
      var method = this.callParent.caller,
          parentClass, methodName;


      if (!method.$owner) {
 
        method = method.caller;
      }


      parentClass = method.$owner.superclass; //<--- method.$owner is undefined
      methodName = method.$name;




      return parentClass[methodName].apply(this, args || []);
    }
The upside is that it doesn't stop execution because it's called from defer, but I would expect this to work. After-all this is a paid commercial product and should be properly tested.
item.author: psteininger
